review: I got recommended from practo only. And thank God I got the right doctor. Dr Preeti ma'am helped me overcome my fears of extreme dental phobia. She is well versed with handling people like me. I got single sittingRCT  AND 5 front filling in my teeth. She guided me what was going wrong and I got fluoride treatment also as I am getting so many cavities due to my food habits. Iam so grateful to have found the right person. They are really hygienic clinic and genuine advice. Surely recommend to one and all. Their Instagram profile says it all .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a swelling on my lower tooth and I was very concerned. Dr Preeti not only helped me with my fears but gave a correct diagnosis of a granuloma. I will never go anywhere else as I trust them completely with the right thing. They don't give unnecessary treatment here. That's what I like. Again thanks from the bottom of my heart ma'am
